channel.title: Changing max amount of items from 999m to 2147m
channel.description:
i need some help on how to change it so the max amount of items u can have is 2147m instead of 999m
could any1 help

item.title: Changing max amount of items from 999m to 2147m
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Holy-Wings, post:3, topic:218944”]Jodie, your so dumb… -.- Ok … Go on “Player.JAVA” > Crtl + F Or H Then type in “999999999” once you see it, Replace it with “2147000000”

 Player.JAVA -> Crtl + F -> Search for 999999999 -> Replace with 2147000000

Who’s Jodie? I’m dumb? I don’t really give a shit about private servers and all, just here to learn and have fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing max amount of items from 999m to 2147m

item.title: Changing max amount of items from 999m to 2147m
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Use common sense, try searching ‘999999999,’ which is 999m, and changing to ‘2147000000,’ which is 2147m…
